title: Hand writing type
content:
Can anyone recommend a face that has a similar appearance to this? Thank you.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124115im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28416.jpg)   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124115im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28417.jpg)
author: jonathanlawley

comments.content:
Red Rooster's Alghera and Unifonts Hudson Serif Rough are fairly similar. These and many other hand printed styles are from Part 6 of the Script Font ID Guide, if you want to look for others. I've attached Alghera and Hudson Serif. The Rough version is a bit 'crustier' looking, if that's part of what you wanted.   
 ![Alghera Sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124115im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28425.gif) ![HudsonSerif Sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124115im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28426.gif)

That list of Stephen's will be a helpful one for me to find some new candidates for the Script Guide. I have many of them, but there are always a few more somewhere...   
   
Thanks for adding that Yves.
